sources.title: Hour of Glory
sources.description: Title: Hour of Glory Summary: As the Germans drop explosive booby-traps on Britain in 1943, the embittered expert who'll have to disarm them fights a private battle with alcohol. Directed by: Michael Powell, Emeric Pressburger Actors: Production Company: The Archers Release Date: 23 February 1952 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The best bomb disposal officer during World War II was badly injured and is in frequent pain. He finds solace and relief from his pain in the whisky bottle & the pills that are never far away. A new type of booby trapped bomb push his nerves & resolution to the limit.
